carrying_event.description: [string]Event which is fired when picked up

lost_event.description: [string]Event which is fired when the carry objective is lost

complete_event.description: [string]Event which is fired when the carry objective is in the shuttle or completed

delivery_unit_type.description: [unit]The path to the unit type that we can drop to

fail_on_lost_time.description: How long a carry needs to be considered `lost` to fail objective

position_marker_unit_type.description: [unit]Marker used for randomly positioning on spawn

map_icon.description: [material]icon that this carryable appears as on the minimap

deploy_area_tag.description: [string]Tag to match with an objective carry deployment area component or interaction zone name, when a carryable can be deployed/used.

deploy_helldiver_ability.description: Ability to play on helldiver when deploying carryable

carryable_deployed_ability.description: Ability to play on the carryable once deployed

carry_entity_type.description: Used for identification by the Objective delivery component
